name: cyberchef
description: CyberChef is a web-based platform for performing a wide range of cyber operations like encoding, decoding, encryption, compression, analysis and data manipulation. It runs entirely in the browser and can be self-hosted.
features: Cyber Operations: Encode, decode, encrypt, and decrypt data. Swiss Army knife for data.
Browser-Based: No installation needed, runs entirely in browser. Instant access anywhere.
Recipe System: Chain operations together for complex tasks. Powerful workflow automation.
Data Analysis: Parse and analyze various data formats. Comprehensive toolset.
Compression Tools: Handle compressed and archived data. Universal format support.
Self-Hosted: Run your own instance for sensitive operations. Complete privacy and security.
